title: A dialogue between alkali and acid containing divers philosophical and medicinal considerations : wherein a late pretended new hypothesis asserting alkali the cause and acid the cure of all diseases, is proved groundless and dangerous : being a specimen of the immodest self-applause, shameful contempt, and abuse of all physicians, gross mistakes and great ignorance of the pretender John Colbatch / by T.E., Chirurgo-Medicus.
author: Emes, Thomas, d. 1707.
publisher: Printed for R. Cumberland ... and Tho. Speed ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
